name: Hamster on Rails
description:
Your village needs more minerals and crystals and that's why you, as the best and bravest railroad builder hamster, have been assigned this adventure. You'll travel across different worlds, building crazy railroads to solve fun puzzles and thus making it possible to extract these resources so important to your beloved people.

  • Travel through four different worlds in a total of 64 stages
  • Use 8 different pieces to assemble the railways, including levers to change the direction of the rails and buttons to activate different mechanisms (doors, elevators, etc.)
  • Find chests with new SKINS and use them to customize your Hamster
  • Help other hamsters along the way with secondary tasks (not mandatory)
